name: Demon's Tier+
overview: Enter the dungeons of King Thosgar and destroy his demonic minions! Combining the best elements from Xenon Valkyrie+ and Riddled Corpses EX, this is the latest game in the Diabolical Mind trilogy! Demon's Tier+ is a dungeon-RPG roguelike with arcade and adventure elements. Thosgar, a hated king attracted by demonic rituals, turned into a dark and diabolical being... destroying almost all of humanity and flooding the world with monsters. This story became a legend and peace returned to the land. A thousand years later, a mysterious pit appears in a village after a huge earthquake where an evil aura emanates from... Will you be the hero to save this world? Features: • Epic storyline • 2 players local cooperation mode • 8 heroes with different stats and abilities • Procedurally generated dungeons • High quality chiptune music • Twin-stick shooting • Achievements • Localized into 4 languages
